title: tudhikkaikkuriya
sahitya:
tudikkaikkuriya AdiyE jayajaya tudikkai gaNapatiyE jaya jaya



anupallavi



 vidhikkum shashipatikkum shrIpatikkum pashupatikkum sadA



caraNam



 tamizhmozhi enakkaruLvAi iniya shentamizhuruvAi niraivAidamiyEn-

UllatAnandat-tANdavamADuvAi sarguNa harikEshan tanayanAi nADuvAi
